results.title: Exploring metformin as a candidate drug for rosacea through network pharmacology and experimental validation.
results.text_hl: We found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment significantly improved @DISEASE_Rosacea @DISEASE_MESH:D012393 @@@rosacea@@@-like @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin lesions@@@ including immune cells infiltration, cytokines/chemokines expression and angiogenesis.

results.title: Metformin: A Potential Treatment for Acne, Hidradenitis Suppurativa and Rosacea
results.text_hl: Considering the anti-androgenic, anti-angiogenic, anti-fibrotic and antioxidant properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, it may have the potential to improve @DISEASE_Chronic_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic@@@ @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin diseases@@@.
